fields.value: Political Analysis Using R: Example Code and Data, Plus Data for Practice Problems

dsDescriptionValue.value: Each R script replicates all of the example code from one chapter from the book. All required data for each script are also uploaded, as are all data used in the practice problems at the end of each chapter. The data are drawn from a wide array of sources, so please cite the original work if you ever use any of these data sets for research purposes.

files.description: Salta, Argentina field experiment on e-voting versus traditional voting. Citation: Alvarez, R. Michael, Ines Levin, Julia Pomares, and Marcelo Leiras. 2013. "Voting Made Safe and Easy: The Impact of e-voting on Citizen Perceptions." Political Science Research and Methods 1(1):117-137.
files.label: alpl2013.tab

dataFile.description: Salta, Argentina field experiment on e-voting versus traditional voting. Citation: Alvarez, R. Michael, Ines Levin, Julia Pomares, and Marcelo Leiras. 2013. "Voting Made Safe and Easy: The Impact of e-voting on Citizen Perceptions." Political Science Research and Methods 1(1):117-137.
